PATIENT_ID: TEST_OSTEO_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-25 10:00:00
Patient diagnosed with osteomyelitis of the left tibia.
Bone infection confirmed following open fracture repair.

[LAB] 2026-01-25 09:00:00
Culture from bone biopsy positive for Staphylococcus aureus.
Organism identified from bone specimen.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-25 08:00:00
MRI left tibia: Findings consistent with bone infection.
Marrow edema and periosteal reaction suggesting osteomyelitis.
